description: Tests your hypervisor configuration to validate that backup gateway can connect with the hypervisor and its resources.

parameters.name: GatewayArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the gateway to the hypervisor to test.

parameters.name: Host
parameters.description: The server host of the hypervisor. This can be either an IP address or a fully-qualified domain name (FQDN).
